text:
be. If a man and 
woman have recently had sex, 
the egg might be fertilised 
here by the man’s sperm. The 
lining of the uterus is now thick 
enough for the fertilised egg to 
be implanted.
If the egg is not fertilised, it 
will pass out of the body 
during the woman’s monthly 
period along with the lining of 
the uterus, which is also shed. 
The egg is so small that it 
cannot be seen.
